label: HS-WD200+
info_overview: HS-WD200+ is a Z-Wave wall dimmer that’s designed for wireless on-oﬀ-dim control of connected dimmable lighting loads.
info_inclusion: Put your Z-Wave controller into inclusion mode, tap the paddle of your new HomeSeer dimmer to begin the inclusion process. This will take a few moments to complete.
info_exclusion: Put your Z-Wave controller into exclusion mode, tap the paddle of your new HomeSeer dimmer to begin the inclusion process. This will take a few moments to complete.
category_description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

parameters.label: Bottom LED Operation
parameters.description: Sets the operation of the bottom LED

options.label: Bottom LED ON if load is OFF
Bottom LED OFF if load is OFF
Top of Paddle turns load ON
Bottom of Paddle turns load ON

parameters.label: Remote Ramp Rate
parameters.description: Set dimmer ramp rate for remote control

parameters.label: Local Ramp Rate
parameters.description: Set dimmer ramp rate for local control

parameters.label: Load Status LED Color
parameters.description: Set the LED color when displaying load status

parameters.label: Blink Frequency
parameters.description: Set blink frequency when displaying custom status

associations.label: Lifeline
associations.description: Lifeline association only supports the "manual reset" event.

associations.label: Companion Sync
associations.description: Any device added to group 2 will be controlled. This allows other WX200 devices to used as companion switches. LEDS will be kept in sync.

commandclass.name: NO_OPERATION
commandclass.label: No Operation - used for PINGing a device.

channels.name: config_decimal
channels.label: Normal mode LED colour
channels.overview:
Sets the Normal mode LED colour

Possible values: 0-6

0=White, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Magenta, 5=Yellow, 6=Cyan

channels.name: config_decimal
channels.label: Status mode LED 1 Colour
channels.overview:
LED 1 is the Bottom LED

Possible values: 0-7

0=Off, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Magenta, 5=Yellow, 6=Cyan, 7=White

channels.name: config_decimal
channels.label: Sets LED operation (in normal mode)
channels.overview:
0= LED ON if load is OFF

1= LED OFF if load is OFF

channels.name: config_decimal
channels.label: Sets paddle’s load orientation
channels.overview:
0 = Top of Paddle turns load ON

1 = Bottom of Paddle turns load ON

channels.name: config_decimal
channels.label: Status mode LED 7 Colour
channels.overview:
LED 7 is the top LED

 Possible values: 0-7

 0=Off, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Magenta, 5=Yellow, 6=Cyan, 7=White

channels.name: config_decimal
channels.label: Status mode LEDs Blink frequency
channels.overview:
Sets the dimmer Blink frequency for All LEDs in Status mode 

 Possible values: 0, 1-255

0=No blink, 1=100ms ON then 100ms OFF

xml.xml:
Overview

HS-WD200+ is a Z-Wave wall dimmer that’s designed for wireless on-oﬀ-dim control of connected dimmable lighting loads.


Inclusion Information

Put your Z-Wave controller into inclusion mode, tap the paddle of your new HomeSeer dimmer to begin the inclusion process. This will take a few moments to complete.


Exclusion Information

Put your Z-Wave controller into exclusion mode, tap the paddle of your new HomeSeer dimmer to begin the inclusion process. This will take a few moments to complete.
